name: Bomber Penguin
description:
Use left and right arrow keys/ "A" and "D" keys to move.

Up arrow/ "W" key to create a bomb.

Space Bar to blow up bomb.

"R" to restart.

A scientist and his assistant have created the world's first penguin! But there's something different about this penguin... Oh yeah, it can generate bombs! But due to a cheap enclosure, it has escaped! You play as the Bomber Penguin making your way through rooms full of obstacles trying to find your way to the open world. And since you're still a penguin you can't fly or in this case since you're around 500 Ibs (226.796 Kg), you can't jump either.
